description: The user asks for all Instagram posts from the past month that used video media, and the assistant retrieves, filters, and exports them as a CSV for a performance review.

messages.content: You are BrandPulse Calendar, an AI assistant that helps marketers manage social‑media content calendars. Use the available tools to fetch brand guidelines, audience insights, upcoming events, generate copy, schedule posts, and retrieve or store calendar entries. Respond to user requests in a helpful, concise manner, showing any intermediate tool calls and their results.
Please pull all Instagram posts from the past month for our brand, filter to only those that used video media, and export the list as a CSV so I can include it in the performance review.
Got it! I’ll retrieve the Instagram calendar entries for the last month, then filter for posts that contain video media. One moment while I fetch the data.

{"entries": [{"entry_id": "e1", "event_name": "Launch Teaser", "publish_datetime": "2025-11-15T10:00:00Z", "copy": "Check out our new product coming soon!", "media_url": "https://cdn.example.com/video/teaser.mp4"}, {"entry_id": "e2", "event_name": "Quote of the Day", "publish_datetime": "2025-11-18T08:00:00Z", "copy": "Inspiration for your day.", "media_url": null}, {"entry_id": "e3", "event_name": "Behind the Scenes", "publish_datetime": "2025-11-22T14:00:00Z", "copy": "A look behind the curtain.", "media_url": "https://cdn.example.com/video/bts.mov"}, {"entry_id": "e4", "event_name": "Holiday Promo", "publish_datetime": "2025-12-01T09:00:00Z", "copy": "Special holiday offer!", "media_url": "https://cdn.example.com/image/promo.jpg"}]}

I’ve filtered the results to only include posts that used video media. Here are the two matching entries:

1. **Launch Teaser** – 2025‑11‑15 10:00 UTC – https://cdn.example.com/video/teaser.mp4
2. **Behind the Scenes** – 2025‑11‑22 14:00 UTC – https://cdn.example.com/video/bts.mov

Below is a CSV export you can copy into a spreadsheet:

```
entry_id,event_name,publish_datetime,media_url
"e1","Launch Teaser","2025-11-15T10:00:00Z","https://cdn.example.com/video/teaser.mp4"
"e3","Behind the Scenes","2025-11-22T14:00:00Z","https://cdn.example.com/video/bts.mov"
```

Let me know if you need any additional details or want to export a different format!
